message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You got lucky last round, but I'm not going to let you off that easily!
I'll give you a bigger share, but not that big!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
I'll give you the majority, but not everything!
You're getting close to the edge, but I'm not going to let you take the majority just yet!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're running out of options, and I'm running out of patience!
